sentence.idiomatic: If you have any problems, please call us at any time.
When the cell phone has no signal, can we call the emergency line?
Making calls within the city costs three jiao per minute.
Her habit is to turn off her cell phone when she is sleeping.
I didn't turn off my cell phone. Maybe the battery is dead, so it turned off automatically.
Why do you constantly have your phone switched off lately?
No wonder everyone is sending flowers today, it's because today is Valentine's Day.
She wrote down the wrong address, no wonder I didn't find that place.
It was so late and you still hadn't come home; no wonder he has to worry about you.
There's nothing he hates more than for people to disturb him during his break time.
The exam is coming up soon. Don't come to disturb his studying.
You being here is only disturbing my work; go away.
He really wants to have a little private space to do the things he likes.
The second he isn't feeling well, he will go to see his personal doctor.
This is his private property; it has nothing to do with anyone.
You misunderstood him this time. He was late because he was buying flowers for you.
Don't misunderstand. We ran into each other on the street, we didn't arrange it.
When they are together they don't talk about anything?it's the easiest way to create misunderstandings.
I haven't finished dialing and the cell phone battery is already dead.
I'm sorry, I have to hang up. My cell phone battery is almost dead.
The two batteries are both dead. I'd better hurry up and charge them.
Just as he opened the door, a bunch of journalists ran in.
Yesterday a big group of our classmates went out to drink wine.
Business is so good today. After a big group of people leaves, another big group comes.
He is busy explaining the reason to the customers.
However there is no use of you to keep on explaining it, he is already gone.
How could they know our company's plan? Please give me a reasonable explanation.
He is the same in front of anyone: a professional smooth talker.
You are the same as your father, you don't do anything around the house.
Actually, all jobs are the same. Only if you work hard,you will be able to succeed.
I wonder what time Zhang Liang is working overtime until today. Why don’t I give him a call and ask him.
(Recording): “Sorry, the telephone you have dialed is switched off.”
Strange! His phone is switched off. I’ll try giving him a call at his office. (sound of numbers dialing) Hello, Zhang Liang?
Ha ha ha…Who is this?
Huh? Uh, I’m looking for Zhang Liang.
Oh. Zhang Liang, telephone. Hurry.
Hello.
No wonder you didn’t turn on your cell phone. So it’s because you’re busy working overtime together with your female co-worker. Am I interrupting your private time together?
Lili, don’t misunderstand. My cell phone battery died. There are a bunch of us all working overtime together.
Forget it. Stop explaining. You men are all alike. (hangs up the phone)
Lili, listen to me…Hello, hello? (dials number)
(Recording): “Sorry, the telephone you have dialed is switched off.”

word.literal: to have a dead battery; to have no electricity
